contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1960 D Chesterfield Rural District Council Invitation Contest (Championship)
Chesterfield Rural District Council Invitation Contest (Championship) 510 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival chesterfield-rural-district-council-invi-969
Test Piece Contest
Le Roi d'Ys
Bradbury Hall, Chesterfield This was also classed as a Yorkshire v Midlands contest divided into two parts, part two being a massed band contest. Representing Yorkshire were Crossley Carpets and Yorkshire Imperial conducted by John Harrison and representing the Midlands Creswell Colliery and Ransome & Marles conducted by George Hespe. The final result was Midlands 274 points, Yorkshire 230. See also Yorkshire v Midlands contests.
May 7, 2011, 7:39 p.m. May 16, 2014, 8:24 a.m.
1 Ransome Band George Hespe
2 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band George Hespe
3 Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison
4 Creswell Colliery Band Unknown
